sentences.en: Don't tie [ put on ] your shoes in a melon patch or adjust your hat under a plum tree -- avoid being suspected.
sentences.cn: 瓜田不纳 履,李下不整冠.

sentences.en: Everybody was riding out Peachtree road to gather greenery and have a picnic and melon cutting.
sentences.cn: 人人都离开桃树街去采集青枝绿叶,举行野宴和吃西瓜去了.

sentences.en: He found Joe Harper and Huck Finn up an alley eating a stolen melon.
sentences.cn: 他还发现乔-哈帕和哈克-费恩正在一条巷子里吃偷来的甜瓜.

sentences.en: Next, she disembowelled a melon with a quiet fury.
sentences.cn: 接着，她闷着头愤愤地掏空瓜瓤。

sentences.en: No. I want some melon seeds.

sentences.cn: 熏鲑鱼 、 冰西瓜, 要什么饮料?

sentences.en: Sweep the melon - seed shells into a dustpan.
sentences.cn: 把瓜子壳胡噜到簸箕里.

sentences.en: This melon weighs more than ten jin, I should think.
We garnished the melon with strawberries.
When he arrived back, Tigress was cracking melon seeds to distract herself.
sentences.cn: 回到家中, 虎妞正在屋里嗑瓜子儿解闷呢.

words.tran_cn: 瓜；甜瓜；大肚子；圆鼓鼓像瓜似的东西

trans.tran_cn: 甜瓜，圆鼓鼓像瓜似的东西，瓜
trans.tran_en: a large round fruit with sweet juicy flesh
